text:
@NYGovCuomo Dear Mr.Andrew Cuomo,

This is Estelle from China.

I just happen to read an article of the coronavirus in New York, the nurses are lacking protective coveralls, goggle, face masks... If any need, my whatsapp/phone number is +86 18762328320
My email is estellefeiling@gmail.com
